DOC.brief_title: Dehydroepiandrosterone Administration Women With Systemic Lupus Erythematosus Primary Sjögren 's Syndrome
DOC.detailed_description: Fatigue reduce general well-being frequent complaint patient chronic autoimmune disorder systemic lupus erythematosus ( SLE ) primary Sjögren 's syndrome ( pSS ) . Uncontrolled study suggest administration dehydroepiandrosterone ( DHEA ) may improve complaint . The aim randomize double-blind placebo-controlled study examine effect daily oral 200 mg DHEA fatigue , well-being , function woman SLE pSS .
